mapper.select: SELECT sa.id as sa_id, sav.id as sav_id, sa.*, sav.*, if (ssav.sku_id, 1, 0) as isChecked FROM pms_product_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN pms_product_sale_attr_value sav ON sa.product_id = #{productId} AND sa.sale_attr_id = sav.sale_attr_id AND sa.product_id = sav.product_id LEFT JOIN pms_sku_sale_attr_value ssav ON ssav.sku_id = #{skuId} AND sav.id = ssav.sale_attr_value_id
